title: Game doesn't start
body:
Hey guys,

So I launch LoL without any problem and then I queue for a game, I find the game, select my chanmpion and then the game doesn't start... i restarted the Pc like 5 times, repaired the game about 50 times and still nothing, I played LoL today so I'm not sure why out of nowhere it stopped working. 

Please help,
~Georgiee

replies.body:
Georgiee,

Have you tried any fixes so far? Like, [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) or [releasing/renewing your IP](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq9)?

Have you triple checked your firewall settings to make sure the latest instance of League is allowed through?

Yes mate, I was playing fine, then took a break, went back to the game and my screen was half blue and every time someone would get a double / tripple / penta kill my screen would go blue :/ 

Then I closed LoL, started it again and repaired it, after the game stopped working for me, I was even put in a low queue punishment because this happened a few days ago

>the game doesn't start

I'm sorry, I got the idea you were unable to get into the game.

What you've just described sounds like a hardware/software issue, not a connection issue. Make sure you've updated all your drivers/softwares and if that doesn't fix it, tell me.

By any chance have you recently shut-down your computer by removing it's power instead of using it's shut-down command?

I just re-installed the game and it works now.

Not sure what happened :/
